import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score, f1_score, confusion_matrix, classification_report
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns

ENRICHED_CSV = '2025-10-18_enriched.csv'  # upload to Colab
df = pd.read_csv(ENRICHED_CSV)
print('Dataset shape:', df.shape)
df.head(5)

# Fail ratio feature
df['fail_ratio'] = df['fail_count'] / df['occ_count'].replace(0,1)

# Log-transform to reduce skew
df['log_occ_count'] = np.log1p(df['occ_count'])
df['log_fail_count'] = np.log1p(df['fail_count'])

# Encode categorical features (simple frequency encoding for 'country' and 'org')
for col in ['country','org']:
    freq = df[col].value_counts(normalize=True)
    df[col+'_freq'] = df[col].map(freq)

# Select features for model
features = ['occ_count','fail_count','fail_ratio','log_occ_count','log_fail_count',
            'unique_ports','unique_usernames','country_freq','org_freq']
X = df[features]
y = df['classification']

X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(
    X, y, test_size=0.3, random_state=42, stratify=y

rf = RandomForestClassifier(n_estimators=200, max_depth=None, random_state=42)
rf.fit(X_train, y_train)
y_pred = rf.predict(X_test)

acc = accuracy_score(y_test, y_pred)
f1 = f1_score(y_test, y_pred, average='weighted')
print(f'Accuracy: {acc:.4f}, F1 (weighted): {f1:.4f}')
print('\nClassification Report:')
print(classification_report(y_test, y_pred))

# Confusion matrix
cm = confusion_matrix(y_test, y_pred, labels=['other','suspicious','bruteforce'])
plt.figure(figsize=(6,5))
sns.heatmap(cm, annot=True, fmt='d', xticklabels=['other','suspicious','bruteforce'], 
            yticklabels=['other','suspicious','bruteforce'], cmap='Blues')
plt.xlabel('Predicted')
plt.ylabel('True')
plt.title('Confusion Matrix')
plt.show()

feat_imp = pd.Series(rf.feature_importances_, index=features).sort_values(ascending=False)
plt.figure(figsize=(8,4))
sns.barplot(x=feat_imp.values, y=feat_imp.index)
plt.title('Feature Importance')
plt.show()
## 7️⃣ Preview 30 lines of processed dataset + predictions

df_preview = df.copy()
df_preview['pred_class'] = rf.predict(X)
print('=== 30 dòng đầu của dataset processed với dự đoán ===')
